capability_gate_slides_leveling.text: You may be asked to observe indicator lights, warning messages, and control panel states using normal controls. You will not be asked to crawl under the RV, remove panels, or operate manual overrides. Are you comfortable proceeding?

safety_check_slide_level_hazard.text: If the RV is unstable, shifting, leaning unexpectedly, or if any person or pet is in a pinch area, stop immediately. Do not attempt to move slides or level the RV until the area is clear and the RV is stable. You may stop the diagnostic at any time to capture the current state for a technician. Continue only if no immediate hazard is present.

primary_system_selection.text: Which system are you having trouble with right now?

slide_primary_symptom.text: What best describes the slide-out issue?

slide_no_movement_check.text: When you attempt to move the slide, do you see or hear any response such as a click, motor sound, or indicator light change?

slide_partial_movement_check.text: Does the slide stop at the same point each time it moves?

slide_uneven_movement_check.text: Does one side of the slide move more than the other?

slide_noise_check.text: Are the noises grinding, popping, or banging rather than smooth motor sounds?

slide_power_interlock_check.text: Are any warning messages or indicator lights shown on the slide or leveling control panel?

slide_binding_or_sync_issue.text: Does the slide appear square and aligned when stopped?

leveling_primary_symptom.text: What best describes the leveling system issue?

leveling_no_start_check.text: When you attempt to start leveling, do you see any response from the control panel?

leveling_partial_cycle_check.text: Does the leveling system stop at the same point during each attempt?

leveling_accuracy_issue.text: Does the control panel indicate level, but the RV still feels unlevel?

leveling_interlock_check.text: Are there any warning messages or interlock indicators shown on the leveling control panel?

safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Pause diagnosis and schedule a technician.

terminal_multiple_systems_affected.result: Slide and leveling systems both affected

artifact.stop_reason: User reported both systems not operating normally
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Both systems confirmed. Both reported affected
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
Do not attempt repeated operation if the RV is unstable.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate common power, interlock, or control causes.

terminal_slide_no_response.result: Slide shows no response to command

artifact.stop_reason: No click, motor sound, or indicator change observed when attempting slide movement
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Slide system confirmed. No response observed
artifact.primary_symptom: Slide will not move at all
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate slide control power, switches, and interlocks.

terminal_slide_sync_issue.result: Slide synchronization or alignment issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: Uneven or crooked slide movement observed
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Slide system confirmed. Uneven movement observed
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
Do not travel unless the slide is fully secured per manufacturer guidance.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate slide synchronization, drive components, and alignment.

artifact.stop_reason: Abnormal grinding, popping, or banging noises observed during slide movement
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Slide system confirmed. Abnormal noises observed
artifact.primary_symptom: Slide moves but makes abnormal noises
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Stop operation if abnormal noises occur.
Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate mechanical binding or component failure.

terminal_slide_interlock_or_control_issu.result: Slide interlock or control issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: Warning message or indicator present on slide or leveling control panel
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Slide system confirmed. Warning indicator present
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Record the exact warning message for the technician.
Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to diagnose the interlock condition or control system fault.

terminal_slide_power_or_motor_issue.result: Slide power or motor issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: No warning indication present but slide does not move normally
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Slide system confirmed. Not moving normally
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate power supply, motor drive, and control outputs.

terminal_slide_obstruction_or_load_issue.result: Slide obstruction or load issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: Slide stops at the same point and remains square when stopped
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Slide system confirmed. Stops at same point
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Keep people and pets clear of pinch areas.
Avoid repeated operation if movement is restricted.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to inspect for obstruction, binding, or load-related causes.

artifact.stop_reason: No response from leveling control panel when attempting to start
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Leveling system confirmed. No panel response
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If the RV is unstable, stop and keep people clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate leveling power supply and control panel power.

terminal_leveling_sensor_or_interlock_is.result: Leveling sensor or interlock issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: Leveling system stops at the same point during each attempt
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Leveling system confirmed. Stops at same point
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If the RV is unstable, stop and keep people clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to diagnose sensors, interlocks, or error conditions.

terminal_leveling_calibration_or_sensor_.result: Leveling calibration or sensor accuracy issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: Panel indicates level but RV still feels unlevel
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Leveling system confirmed. Panel shows level but feels unlevel
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If the RV is unstable, stop and keep people clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to verify sensor calibration and level accuracy.

artifact.stop_reason: Interlock or warning message present on leveling control panel
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Leveling system confirmed. Interlock message present
artifact.primary_symptom: Manual mode unavailable or interlock present
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Record the exact warning message for the technician.
If the RV is unstable, stop and keep people clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to diagnose the interlock condition.

terminal_leveling_hydraulic_or_motor_iss.result: Leveling hydraulic or motor issue suspected

artifact.stop_reason: No interlock indication present but leveling system does not operate normally
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Leveling system confirmed. Not operating normally
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: If the RV is unstable, stop and keep people clear of pinch areas.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to evaluate leveling actuators, motors, or hydraulic system operation.
